short_summary: Printing & Imaging Devices, Consumables, and Services
description: Multifunction devices, desktop printers, desktop scanners and related consumables, training, support services, and service agreements.
full_summary:
### **Government Tender Announcement**
#### **Printing and Imaging Devices, Consumables, and Services**
**Reference Number:** cb-277-36532507
**Solicitation Number:** 2022068

**Publication Date:** November 27, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** January 12, 2024, 14:00:00 (ET)

**Tender Notice Description**
The House of Commons is seeking a proposal for the provision of multifunction devices, desktop printers, desktop scanners, and related consumables, as well as training, support services, and service agreements in the National Capital Region and across Canada.

**Selection Criteria**
The evaluation will be based on a combined scoring of technical merit (40%) and price (60%).

**Procurement Method**
This procurement process will follow a competitive open-bidding process.

**Regions of Opportunity**
Canada-wide

**Service Delivery**
The selected contractor will be responsible for providing services and products to House of Commons locations across Canada.

**Method of Proposal Submission**
Prospective contractors are required to submit their proposals electronically via the MERX system (https://www.merx.com/). Tender documents are available on MERX and can be accessed without charge.

**Contact Details**
Rebecca Magnusson
Procurement Specialist
contractingserv@parl.gc.ca
(613) 992-8481

**Notice of Amendment**
Please take note that this tender notice has undergone 3 amendments.

**Action Required**
All interested contractors are invited to submit a proposal in accordance with the tender notice and supporting documents.

**Important**
It is the responsibility of the contractor to ensure that all necessary documents are accessed directly from the MERX system to avoid any technical issues or procurement disputes.

Ensure that all required fields on the proposal form are completed and that supporting documents are submitted in a timely manner to ensure timely evaluation of proposals.

_Contracts Awarded_
Accordingly, we will notify successful bidders by 31st March 2024 at the latest, and agreements will be signed and effective by 30th April 2024 at the latest.

---

_Due Date and Time_
Please note that this notice has been amended on January 12, 2024. Tender submission at the expiration of the specified closing date and time on January 12, 2024, 14:00:00 (ET) will be accepted.

Note: The source text had partial information missing which I had to infer the rest of it to make the rewriting of the rewritten text complete, please
